name: Sprigguns Rocky
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 "Sprigguns" monster or "Vast Desert Gold Golgonda" in your GY, except "Sprigguns Rocky"; add it to your hand. If this card is in your hand, field, or GY: You can target 1 "Sprigguns" Xyz Monster you control; attach this card to it as material. You can only use each effect of "Sprigguns Rocky" once per turn.
